    • Your marketplace for moving

    Swapt is a modern online marketplace designed to help college students avoid the hassle of the college moving process

    Sign up with email→Learn How Swapt Works →

    Innovating the way you move

    With Swapt, you can browse for furniture items listed by the current tenants of your next apartment or home. On top of that, you can buy single or bundled furniture pieces directly on our site.

    Avoid the stress of moving

    Moving sucks. Avoid the heavy lifting, expensive moving companies and storage lockers, and the insane stress of the moving-process with Swapt. Are you ready to sit back, relax, and let your listing do the moving for you? It's simple!

    • Add your images and items to your account.
    • Bundle them together to create your listing.
    • Wait for the incoming tenant to make an offer and done. Moving solved.
    Ready to move?
    Whether you are moving in or moving out, Swapt has the solution to help you stress less.
    Sign Up with Email→Learn How Swapt Works →
    Why use Swapt?

    Swapt saves you time and money

    Moving companies and storage lockers cost hundreds of dollars; with Swapt, instead of your money going out the window, the furniture you purchase store the value, we only take a small fee.

    Swapt makes the moving process as smooth as possible

    Swapt works with property managers at your campus to make sure your moving process is as smooth as possible.

    With Swapt, you can avoid the stress, hassle, and toll of the moving process

    Moving is more than just moving day. It’s a series of complex decisions made over the course of weeks that culminate on moving day. Each decision can cause stress which may not alleviate until you’re settled in your new home.
